item.title: Approach to Climbing
item.description: Beyond a hobby I always think, and in some rare occasions, tell other people how the should try to pursue a hobby, activity or whatever that might make them feel as alive as something you really feel passionate about. Whenever I think or say it, I try not to make it sound as a predicament —sorry if it does some time, I swear it is not my intention. I don’t say this lightly.
